name: Late-Onset Parkinson's Disease with Mild Cognitive Impairment
chief_complaint: I've been shaking a lot lately and keep forgetting things

lab_results.DaTscan: reduced dopamine transporter uptake in basal ganglia

prognosis: Progressive condition with variable cognitive decline; motor symptoms typically respond well to medication initially
description: A neurodegenerative disorder characterized by both motor symptoms (tremor, rigidity, bradykinesia) and early cognitive changes in elderly patients, distinct from typical Parkinson's disease by later onset and more prominent cognitive involvement
multiple_choice: Late-Onset Parkinson's Disease with Mild Cognitive Impairment
